title.narrative: Improving Service Delivery & Local Economic Development In Secondary Towns In Kenya (2016-2018)

description.narrative:
The purpose of the project is to tap into UN-Habitat's global expertise to support sustainable urbanization in Kenya.
Specifically, the project will achieve the following objectives;
Develop a pilot Sustainable Urban Mobility Plan (SUMP) that promotes NMT
Strengthen revenue generation streams through improved Local Economic Development (LED) in Kenya
Establish a long term solid waste management strategy that incorporates youth entrepreneurship through waste recycling

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: 1. Pilot Sustainable Urban Mobility Plan (SUMP) developed
